title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-2.4 - Monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-2.4 - Monitoring

State Regulations
(a) The agency
reservoir releases manager shall be responsible for monitoring the total
available amount of water stored in the Cannonsville, Pepacton and Neversink
reservoirs and for notifying the department reservoir releases manager at least
24 hours prior to an anticipated change from one reservoir storage condition to
another. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
